channel.title: Comments for page "Super Robots"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Super Robots"

item.title: Trivia
item.content:encoded:
Technically, from the Atlus localization (which would be official, if anything is), that's Dygenguard, with Aussenseiter (but heck, you can call it Trombe, 'Ratsel' sure does) nearby.

Soul of Steel, their drop, refers to the awesome Soul of Steel item you can get in SRW Original Generations (among other SRW titles).
